messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Hey, I need to move my appointment to a different day.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: No, this is David Thompson. I’d like to reschedule my appointment.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Got it, David. To help you

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Great, thank you! I currently have an appointment on Thursday at 2 PM.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thanks for sharing that. Can you tell me your date of birth so I can verify your identity and help with rescheduling?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Let me confirm. Your name is David Thompson. Your date of birth is February third nineteen eighty. That correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Yes, that's correct. My first name is spelled D-A-V-I-D and my last name is T-H-O-M-P-S-O-N.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please provide that number. You're not sure, just let me know, and we can confirm your name and date of birth again.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: I'm not sure of the phone number on file. Can we just confirm my name and date of birth again?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: No problem. Please spell your first and last name for me one more time. And confirm your date of birth.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Sure! My name is David Thompson, spelled D-A-V-I-D T-H-O-M-P-S-O-N. My date of birth is February 3, 1980.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: I can't proceed further right now, but I can make sure our clinic support team follows up with you. Please hold on while I document your request for rescheduling your appointment.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Okay, thanks for your help. I’ll hold on.
